name: Vote Stay
description:
A blend of the old and new site styles with a lot of minor tweaks to things that bug me.

Uses much of the old color scheme and layout, keeps the top bar always visible, and has a crude implementation of a moving right-side nav bar section to allow full site navigation below the minimum width.

Note: Intended to be used in conjunction with uBlock Origin. This has not been tested without it so results may vary.
